StringTable.Label: Tutorial1_Description
StringTable.String: Learn basic ship movement and map navigation, to lead your fleets to victory!

StringTable.Label: Tutorial2_Description
StringTable.String: Learn how to colonize new worlds.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial3_Description
StringTable.String: One you have a new world, learn how to improve it.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial4_Description
StringTable.String: One ship can't conquer the galaxy alone. To wage real wars you will need fleets.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial5_Description
StringTable.String: Your leaders can be used for various roles. Learn how to use them to fill minister positions that apply civilization-wide bonuses.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial6_Description
StringTable.String: Careful focus on research and your economy is as important as war. Learn how to advance your civilization.
